title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA Must Have for Any Library! A Must Read for Everyone!
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
text: I purchased this book during Banned Books Week and had seen it and heard about it, but never picked it up. I’m not one that reads graphic or comic books, and just didn’t think it would keep my attention. I was so wrong!! This book is excellent, told in a way that is honoring to the author’s life story and the tragic and most humbling viewpoint of one father, husband, son, and friend strives to survive by beyond resourceful and helpful. Even when he had every reason to- the author’s father still believed in the kindness and goodness of others and kept his wife and her memory in the forefront of all he did. Such a beautiful and heartfelt story, and one that should be read and retold to never forget the plight so many Holocaust survivors experienced.
